content.description:
33

A battery of emf <math alttext="script E" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is connected to three resistors, a switch, and a capacitor, as shown above. The resistance of resistor 1 is greater than that of resistor 2, which is greater than that of resistor 3.
content.question: With the switch closed, the circuit is allowed to reach a steady state. Let <math alttext="R equivalent" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>q</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> be the equivalent resistance of the circuit. Which of the following is equal to the potential difference across resistor 2 ?

choices.label: <math alttext="script E times R sub 2, over R equivalent" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>ε</mi><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>q</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator script E times R sub 2, and denominator R sub 2 plus R sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>ε</mi><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mo>+</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>⁢</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="script E minus the fraction with numerator script E times R sub 1, and denominator R equivalent" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>ε</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>q</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="script E minus the fraction with numerator script E times R sub 1, and denominator R equivalent" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>ε</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>q</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
